descriptions: Spend winter vacation with someone or alone
go to school (again)

await next week for school opening
(or hit skip chapter in status menu)
go to school
Subscribe to Neighbor school, at the Hall Town
Ask your mother to sign the subscription paper
find beer for your mother
go to Hall Town to Finish Subscription
Go to police commissariat for a paper certifying that you live here
Go ask your mother again
Negotiate with the police
Find Gambat the rat, for Bob(you might find him in front of the school)
confront the bullies who steal the rat to Rambat
give the rat back
go to the police again
go to city town again
be in the top 3 of any arcades games
beat garashi at any game at the Arcade
go find that 'anno 1999' classic year vintage wine in the bar cellar
go speak to bartender
your good friend herru had someone puke on him at the nternational Bar, you need to go there and avange him
Mission Complet, Stomack Empty, go see herru back

It seems you might have find a way to stop thoses annoying rats
you hear at night
Talk to Saki
Talk to Saki for debrif
Try to understand nyanarchist story
I got some sunglass, I have no idea what to do with it
{phq.quests._find_stuff.from} want me to help him find his {phq.quests._find_stuff.what}, per lose
{phq.quests._give_letter.from} want me to give a letter to {phq.quests._give_letter.to}
Saki wanna talk to U
talk to akira to explore The Lab
